about_the_game:
A puzzly adventure where you hack Pop-up ADs using snookers. Explore a world where hackers get hacked and downloading RAM is a thing ...

> Craft your solution => Mix and match abilities in creative ways ;

> Work with other hackers and security specialists => Create cool hacking combos ;

> Go deep and hack in your own style => Find hidden bizarre secrets ;

> Gameplay();

  • Over 20 hours of shooting viruses and crashing security
  • Optional content triples the playtime above
  • Open-ended levels, craft solutions in your own style
  • No filler levels, no condescending tutorial levels, just pure challenging fun
  • Over 7000 unique Cyberballs to craft
  • Hackers will hack you back
  • Discover the secrets of the world by climbing to the top of The Murky Web

> Story();

Hack the biggest tech corporation ever using a word document, in a fun story with a terabyte of good old internet scam, and a touch of cool cleverness.

> Accessibility_and_game_settings();

  • Supports both windowed and fullscreen, and ultrawide screen resolutions
  • Button remapping, and support for keyboard and mouse or mouse only
  • An expansive set of options to customize Gameplay, Controls, Graphics, Help, Audio, etc. the way you like it
  • There is a quit button in the game :)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel i3 or Ryzen 3, 32 or 64 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 / SM2-compatible card ( generally everything made since 2004 should work )
  • Storage: 333 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
